title: Develop login functionality
description: Implement the login feature to allow users to securely access the system.

title: Design database architecture
description: Create an efficient and scalable database structure to store and retrieve data.

title: Optimize website performance
description: Improve the loading speed and responsiveness of the website for better user experience.

title: Implement user authentication
description: Add authentication functionality to ensure secure access and protect user data.

title: Develop responsive UI
description: Create a user-friendly interface that adjusts to different screen sizes and devices.

title: Integrate third-party APIs
description: Connect the system to external APIs for additional functionality and data sources.

title: Improve search functionality
description: Enhance the search feature to provide accurate and relevant results to users.

title: Create user roles and permissions
description: Implement a role-based access control system to manage user permissions and restrictions.

title: Implement real-time updates
description: Enable live updates and notifications to keep users informed about relevant changes.

title: Test and debug application
description: Perform thorough testing and debugging to ensure the system functions correctly and reliably.
